hero.subtitle: Give your guests a voice. Collect heartfelt messages, photos, and memories in one beautiful digital guestbook.

problem.title: Memories Fade Faster Than You Think
problem.description: We take hundreds of photos ‚Äî but who remembers the stories behind them? The heartfelt words, the inside jokes, the emotions of the moment.
problem.point1: Your best moments are buried under thousands of photos you'll never look at again.
problem.point2: The toast your best friend gave. The joke your uncle told. That handwritten note ‚Äî gone.
problem.point3: Group chats get archived. Stories expire in 24 hours. Real emotions drown in notifications.

solution.title: One Tap. Real Words. Forever.
solution.description: Tap & Tell gives your guests a voice ‚Äî not just a pose. Every entry is a real moment, captured in their own words.
solution.point1: Authentic messages from the people who matter most ‚Äî no filters, no poses.
solution.point2: A digital keepsake you'll actually open, unlike those 2,000 photos on your phone.
solution.point3: Export as PDF, share as slideshow, or print ‚Äî your memories, your way.
